input.sentences: the vehicles were lined up to marvel at .
the jumping action on this vehicle was impressive !
the van was designed and detailed to perfection .
the nice old school cars rocked !
the engine was as pretty as the exterior of the car !
output.sentences: The vehicles were lined up at the car show.
The ones jumping on 2 wheels were impressive.
There was a detailed van painted to perfection.
One car was nice and like the one I drove to school.
Exterior was pretty but the engine was awesome.
